locked.description: This pipeline is maintained by spinnaker as a code, any changes made through the ui will be overwritten

parameterConfig.description: EIAE helmfile version
parameterConfig.name: INT_CHART_VERSION

parameterConfig.description: Path on server where CSAR packages will be downloaded. Please ensure the filesystem has space available for the path provided. E.g. /proj/cloudman
parameterConfig.name: CSAR_DOWNLOAD_LOCATION_PATH

parameterConfig.description: Please append the R-state to the default value in the field. For Testing purpose please use, the R-state is already appended to the parameter (R1A).
